content: Knowing what to do is just as important as knowing what not to do. I think, learning how to say NO is one of the most important tools to a life of abundance. When Steve Jobs returned to Apple after Next, one of the first things he did was cut the product range by 70%, and it worked out pretty well didn’t it? We can’t do it all at once, and in my opinion it’s much better to focus down on the top priorities being all over the place. I’m glad that you addressed this problem many entrepreneurs have of saying “yes” to everything. Great article — I hope we may all learn from this!
